Articles.Content:
(I believe this is the right section as it is technically KSP)

As some of you may be aware, all non-KSP fan mega-threads have been exterminated locked due to an increasing number of people on the forums. Also you may also know, a significant portion of the KSP fanbase is made up of bronies. As such we have decided to make a steam KSP group for bronies, which you can find here. For those of you who do not have steam, you can send one of us an email at [email protected] (it is not my main email, but I will check it from time to time), and I'll try to find a solution.

Cheers, Lars (Annoyingorbits)
Forgive me moderators but I believe this has been moved to the wrong section.

ok, We've reached 15 members, nice job.

(And thank you mods, for not exploding over this thread.)
Should I ask what a Brony is?

Should I ask what a Brony is?

bro pony. It's just a nickname for guys that like to watch "My little pony" i think.
I'll join I'm on mobile right now though

bro pony. It's just a nickname for guys that like to watch "My little pony" i think.

Correct, there's uh, more to it. But that dosen't matter much, basic Idea is what you said.

Thread reopened. I ask of everyone to act maturely and respect people and their preferences. If you can't, then stay away from this thread.

Edited December 24, 2013 by KasperVld
